Keywords: Celebrity , Fantastic Four , Guardians of the Galaxy , S.H.I.E.L.D.
Real Name: Benjamin J. Grimm
Special Powers
I'M PRETTY FAMOUS ON EARTH: Characters that start the game on your force that have Guardians team ability gain Fantastic Four team ability.

February 8, 2022
Battletank
Toughness? That's it? This isn't The Thing. Must be a Skrull.
December 12, 2021
hoojeebo
Yeah, it's not great, but I'd play this Thing on a Guardians theme team just for the trait. However, the current slate of figures that have that TA is not large, so he won't really be useful until there are more. As a side note, y'all should check out just how much Energy Explosion there is on figures with the Guardians TA...4/6 get it somewhere on their dials, and 3/6 start with it. Is that incredibly lazy, or dialed-in design work...? It's hard to tell.
December 8, 2021
The Singularity
Ben Grimm with only toughness is kind of sad.
November 30, 2021
Goop
The FF team ability is nice but overall this is about as average as a Thing as you get can get, average atk and damage with defense being a little on the low side. He's ok but there is better stuff out there for sure.
